code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={userInfo:[],products:[]};export var orebiSlice=createSlice({name:"orebi",initialState:initialState,reducers:{addToCart:function addToCart(state,action){var item=state.products.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});if(item){item.quantity+=action.payload.quantity;}else{state.products.push(action.payload);}},increaseQuantity:function increaseQuantity(state,action){var item=state.products.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});if(item){item.quantity++;}},drecreaseQuantity:function drecreaseQuantity(state,action){var item=state.products.find(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id;});if(item.quantity===1){item.quantity=1;}else{item.quantity--;}},deleteItem:function deleteItem(state,action){state.products=state.products.filter(function(item){return item._id!==action.payload;});},resetCart:function resetCart(state){state.products=[];}}});var _orebiSlice$actions=orebiSlice.actions,addToCart=_orebiSlice$actions.addToCart,increaseQuantity=_orebiSlice$actions.increaseQuantity,drecreaseQuantity=_orebiSlice$actions.drecreaseQuantity,deleteItem=_orebiSlice$actions.deleteItem,resetCart=_orebiSlice$actions.resetCart;export{addToCart,increaseQuantity,drecreaseQuantity,deleteItem,resetCart};export default orebiSlice.reducer;
